name: Steves Garden
description:
Steve, your neighbor, noticed you were starting to get stressed out by life and needed a healthy outlet to find peace. He has asked you to check on his garden and you agreed.

Steve is planting weeds, cause he feels bad for the outcast plants and tries to give them a new home.

You work in his garden, planting and harvesting his weeds and selling them in the Shop. With the money you earned, you can buy new types of weeds which will sell for more and more money.
